text: Xanthocampsomeris is a New World genus of the family Scoliidae, also known as the scoliid wasps. == Species == Species within this genus include: *Xanthocampsomeris completa (Rohwer, 1927) *Xanthocampsomeris fulvohirta (Cresson, 1865) *Xanthocampsomeris hesterae (Rohwer, 1927) *Xanthocampsomeris limosa (Burmeister, 1853) == References == Category:Parasitic wasps Category:Scoliidae Category:Hymenoptera genera
title: Xanthocampsomeris
